question: How many members are there in the Shri Ram Janmabhoomi Teerth Kshetra Trust?
explanation: There are 15 members in the Shri Ram Janmabhoomi Teerth Kshetra Trust. It was set up to construct a Ram temple in Ayodhya, Uttar Pradesh as per the verdict given by Supreme Court. The trust is led by the former Solicitor General of India, Mahant Nrityagopal Das.
